tool_description: This api share the information about wars across the global and its coverage by major news outlets
name: War coverage across the global
title: War coverage across the global

api_list.name: Get All War Information
api_list.description: This will give all the new about war across the global
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://war-coverage-across-the-global.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "war-coverage-across-the-global.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get war news from specific source
api_list.description: This end point will give you the detail articles from the news source you specify
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://war-coverage-across-the-global.p.rapidapi.com/news/thetimes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "war-coverage-across-the-global.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://war-coverage-across-the-global.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "war-coverage-across-the-global.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
